issue.title: [C++][Dataset] Add example/benchmark for reading parquet files with dataset
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6950](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6950). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Create an executable that load a directory with a known partition scheme with a filter and a projection. This will be used as a baseline for future performance improvement but also to show various feature of the dataset API.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6950?focusedCommentId=16964213) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5720
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5720>
